body.name: Black 6 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom, Wooden Black Double Dresser with Gold Handles, Modern Chest Dresser with Deep Drawers for Living Room, Hallway
features: 【MODERN DESIGN】 The 6-drawer dresser with metal legs comes with a simple design and black can be compatible with most room styles and decorations, adding a modern and elegant feeling to your living space, highlighting the style of your furniture.

【STABLE & SAFETY】 Made of quality manufactured wood and equipped with smooth metal runners on each drawer, this wooden cabinet is waterproof, scratch-resistant, wear-resistant, and easy to push and pull. The metal legs separate the wood from the ground to prevent moisture. Dimension: 47.24"(L) x 15.75"(D) x 30.71"(H).

【ORGANIZATION MADE EASY】 Featuring 6 deep drawers and a wide tabletop, this dresser is roomy enough to store all your T-shirts, socks, or trousers. Having one or two of these in the bedroom, your sleep space will be sure to look neat and tidy instantly.

【MULTIPURPOSE USAGE】 Except for being a drawer dresser in your bedroom, this storage cabinet also can be used as a tall nightstand right next to your bed or a side table in the living room to keep snacks and TV remote close to hand. Besides, it is ideal for small spaces such as apartments and dorm rooms.

【FIRST-RATE SERVICE】 This modern bedroom chest of drawers comes with all the tools needed and clear step-to-step instructions. We are committed to providing the best products and services, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Modern and Elegant Dresser for Your Home highlighting the style of your furniture This drawer dresser is made of high quality material Elegant, fine workmanship, beautiful and fashion Drawers are easy to glide and pulled in It is a perfect gift for someone special or treats for you It is suitable for indoor use, likes family room, bedroom and living room Specifications: Material: Particle Board Color: Black Overall Dimensions: 47.24"(L) x 15.75"(D) x 30.71"(H) Drawer Dimensions: 22.83"(L) x 12.2"(D) x 7.48"(H) Load Capacity : 100 lbs / 25 lbs Number of Drawers: 6 Pcs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is beautiful, easy to assemble, extremely sturdy in the drawers are very spacious. This is a great addition to my daughters bedroom as we get ready for her arrival I’m so excited. 5 stars!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dresser
reviews.reviewText: Very good dresse for smaller items such as socks , bras or underwear. Assembly was okay. My boyfriend and i built it together. Definitely helps having 2 people to build it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars nice style but pain to put together
reviews.reviewText: It’s just ok for the money. I like the style but it was such a pain to put together. Too many screws. Typical pressed wood. The doors when I close don’t align. My ikea dresser is more sturdy. My hands hurt from screwdriver from putting it together it took so long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The first thing you gave to do is pour yourself a drink (you’re welcome). Pray to your God and ask for patience. Then…Being organized is key. They number Every. Single. Panel. That’s a good thing because there are a lot of panels. Like… A LOT.So separate them around you. Know where they are. If you can set up a short table where you can work sitting down on a chair that would be great. If not, pray for good circulation and you’re ready to go.This is not difficult at all. But it is time consuming. Highly recommend using a powered drill. You don’t have one? Stop reading this and call or text a friend that can bring it over now. When they drop it off serve them a drink and have them help you! Again… you’re welcome.After it’s all said and done, you may or may not be intoxicated, but you will definitely have a very beautiful elegant looking dresser.My only con here is this. The drawers are not as deep as I would have liked them to be. I’m using these in my daughter’s room (I bought two… you all know by now I finished this drunk!)Other than that. Beautiful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, poorly made
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy this. Ill fitting, cheap parts that break easily. Came damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: It is beautiful and looks more expensive than what it really is. Great staple piece for a kids room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really liked it!! It is not that big, but for the price I think is perfect! The drawers are not too big. Good quality and it was not that hard to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Customer service!!
reviews.reviewText: I love how this company worked with me to get this shipped to the correct address. They were prompt and accommodating. The dresser was easy to assemble and looks great in my daughter room!! So nice!!
